import { React, useState } from 'react'; function Shipping() { const [shippingAddress, setShipping_address] = useState({ phone: '', address: '', country: '', city: '', postalCode: '' }); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Shipping : ", shippingAddress); } const onChangeInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setShipping_address({ ...shippingAddress, [name]: value }) } return
